description: MongoDB Prometheus Exporter Dashboard. A fork inspired from https://grafana.com/grafana/dashboards/2583 which is made to work well with https://github.com/percona/mongodb_exporter.

targets.expr:
avg by () (container_fs_limit_bytes{node_name=~"",id=~"/kubepods.*",container!~"POD|pmm-client|"}) or 
avg by () (sum(avg(node_filesystem_size_bytes{node_name=~"",fstype=~"(ext.|xfs|vfat|)"}) without (mountpoint)) without (device,fstype))

clamp_max(avg by () (container_memory_usage_bytes{node_name=~"",id=~"/kubepods.*",container!~"POD|pmm-client|backup-agent|"} * 100 / container_spec_memory_limit_bytes{node_name="",id=~"/kubepods.*",container!~"POD|pmm-client|backup-agent|"}),100) or  
avg by () (((node_memory_MemAvailable_bytes{node_name=~""} or (node_memory_MemFree_bytes{node_name=~""} + node_memory_Buffers_bytes{node_name=~""} + node_memory_Cached_bytes{node_name=~""})) / node_memory_MemTotal_bytes{node_name=~""}) * 100 or (100 - azure_memory_percent_average{node_name=~""}))

clamp_max(avg(rate(container_cpu_system_seconds_total{node_name=~"",id=~"/kubepods.*",container!~"POD|pmm-client|"}[10s])) or 
((avg by () ((clamp_max(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{node_name=~"",mode="system"}[10s]),1)) or (clamp_max(irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{node_name=~"",mode="system"}[5m]),1)) ))*100 or 
(avg_over_time(node_cpu_average{node_name=~"", mode="system"}[10s]) or 
avg_over_time(node_cpu_average{node_name=~"", mode="system"}[5m]))),100)

avg by (node_name,mode) (clamp_max(((avg by (mode) ( (clamp_max(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{node_name=~"",mode!="idle", mode!="user", mode!="system"}[10s]),1)) or (clamp_max(irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{node_name=~"",mode!="idle", mode!="user", mode!="system"}[5m]),1)) ))*100 or (avg_over_time(node_cpu_average{node_name=~"", mode!="total", mode!="idle", mode!="user", mode!="system"}[10s]) or avg_over_time(node_cpu_average{node_name=~"", mode!="total", mode!="idle", mode!="user", mode!="system"}[5m]))),100))

clamp_max(sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{node_name=~"",id=~"/kubepods.*",container!~"POD|pmm-client|"}[10s]) or rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{node_name="",id=~"/kubepods.*",container!~"POD|pmm-client|"}[5m])) or
max by () (sum  by (cpu) ( (clamp_max(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{node_name=~"",mode!="idle",mode!="iowait"}[10s]),1)) or (clamp_max(irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{node_name=~"",mode!="idle",mode!="iowait"}[5m]),1)) )),1)

clamp_max(avg(rate(container_cpu_user_seconds_total{node_name=~"",id=~"/kubepods.*",container!~"POD|pmm-client|"}[10s])) or 
((avg by () ((clamp_max(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{node_name=~"",mode="user"}[10s]),1)) or (clamp_max(irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{node_name=~"",mode="user"}[5m]),1)) ))*100 or 
(avg_over_time(node_cpu_average{node_name=~"", mode="user"}[10s]) or 
avg_over_time(node_cpu_average{node_name=~"", mode="user"}[5m]))),100)

avg by (node_name)  (time() - container_start_time_seconds{node_name=~"",id=~"/kubepods.*",container!~"POD|pmm-client|"}) or avg by (node_name) ((node_time_seconds{node_name=~""} - node_boot_time_seconds{node_name=~""}) or (time() - node_boot_time_seconds{node_name=~""}))

panels.description: See which node is currently acting as the primary, secondary, ...
panels.title: Member State

targets.expr:
sum(rate(container_network_transmit_bytes_total{node_name="",id=~"/kubepods/.*"}[5s]) or 
irate(container_network_transmit_bytes_total{node_name="",id=~"/kubepods/.*"}[5m])) or 
sum(rate(node_network_transmit_bytes_total{node_name="", device!="lo"}[5s])) or 
sum(irate(node_network_transmit_bytes_total{node_name="", device!="lo"}[5m])) or
sum(max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_network_tx{node_name=""}[5s])) or 
sum(max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_network_tx{node_name=""}[5m]))

sum(rate(container_network_receive_bytes_total{node_name="",id=~"/kubepods/.*"}[5s]) or 
irate(container_network_receive_bytes_total{node_name="",id=~"/kubepods/.*"}[5m])) or
sum(rate(node_network_receive_bytes_total{node_name="", device!="lo"}[5s])) or 
sum(irate(node_network_receive_bytes_total{node_name="", device!="lo"}[5m])) or 
sum(max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_network_rx{node_name=""}[5s])) or 
sum(max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_network_rx{node_name=""}[5m]))

alert.message: MongoDB's average disk i/o utilization has been above 98% for 5 minutes
alert.name: MongoDB's Disk IO Utilization alert

targets.expr:
avg by () (sum(rate(container_fs_reads_bytes_total{node_name="",id=~"/kubepods.*"}[5s]) or irate(container_fs_reads_bytes_total{node_name="",id=~"/kubepods.*"}[5s]))) or
avg by () (rate(node_vmstat_pgpgin{node_name=""}[5s]) * 1024 or irate(node_vmstat_pgpgin{node_name=""}[5m]) * 1024)

avg by () (sum(rate(container_fs_writes_bytes_total{node_name="",id=~"/kubepods.*"}[5s]) or irate(container_fs_writes_bytes_total{node_name="",id=~"/kubepods.*"}[5s]))) or
avg by () ((rate(node_vmstat_pgpgout{node_name=""}[5s]) * 1024 or irate(node_vmstat_pgpgout{node_name=""}[5m]) * 1024))

avg by () (sum(rate(container_fs_reads_bytes_total{node_name="",id=~"/kubepods.*"}[5s]) or irate(container_fs_reads_bytes_total{node_name="",id=~"/kubepods.*"}[5s]))) + 
avg by () (sum(rate(container_fs_writes_bytes_total{node_name="",id=~"/kubepods.*"}[5s]) or irate(container_fs_writes_bytes_total{node_name="",id=~"/kubepods.*"}[5s]))) or 
avg  by () ((rate(node_vmstat_pgpgin{node_name=""}[5s]) * 1024 or irate(node_vmstat_pgpgin{node_name=""}[5m]) * 1024 ) + (rate(container_fs_writes_bytes_total{node_name="",id=~"/kubepods.*"}[5s]) or irate(container_fs_writes_bytes_total{node_name="",id=~"/kubepods.*"}[5s]))) + 
avg by () (sum(rate(container_fs_writes_bytes_total{node_name="",id=~"/kubepods.*"}[5s]) or irate(container_fs_writes_bytes_total{node_name="",id=~"/kubepods.*"}[5s]))) or 
avg  by () ((rate(node_vmstat_pgpgout{node_name=""}[5s]) * 1024 or irate(node_vmstat_pgpgout{node_name=""}[5m]) * 1024))

avg by () (rate(container_memory_swap{node_name="",id=~"/kubepods.*",container!~"POD|pmm-client|"}[5s]) or 
irate(container_memory_swap{node_name="",id=~"/kubepods.*",container!~"POD|pmm-client|"}[5s])) or 
avg by () (rate(node_vmstat_pswpout{node_name=""}[5s]) * 4096 or 
irate(node_vmstat_pswpout{node_name=""}[5m]) * 4096)

title: MongoDB
